html:
By Swastika Mukhopadhyay and Monika Asthana
NewsRise
MUMBAI (Feb 14) -- Events scheduled on Monday:

NEW DELHI: National Company Law Appellate Tribunal to hear Amazon’s case challenging the Competition Commission of India’s orders in Amazon-Future Group deal.

8:30 am: Glenmark Pharmaceuticals management at 3Q conference call.

11:30 am: ONGC management at 3Q analyst call.

12 noon: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman press conference after RBI central board meeting.

NEW DELHI: 12 noon: Government to release January wholesale price inflation data.

12 noon: ACC management at 4Q analyst call.

2.30 pm: Ashok Leyland management at 3Q analyst call.

4:00 pm: Sobha management at 3Q analyst call.

4:00 pm: Grasim Industries management at 3Q analyst call.

NEW DELHI: 5:30 pm: Government to release January consumer price inflation data.

MUMBAI: RBI to conduct four-day variable rate reverse repo auction worth INR2 trillion.

MUMBAI: RBI likely to announce details of INR240 billion weekly bond auction.

EARNINGS: Eicher Motors, Coal India, SpiceJet, Adani Enterprises, Adani Wilmar, Dish TV India, Future Retail, Natco Pharma, Manappuram Finance.
- By Swastika Mukhopadhyay and Monika Asthana; swastika.mukhopadhyay@newsrise.org; +91-33-6813 3333
- Edited by Siddhi Nayak
